actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5316 of title 5, United States Code, relating to level V of the Executive Schedule, to apply to the position of General Counsel of the General Services Administration.

summary.text: Places the position of General Counsel of the General Services Administration under level V of the Executive Schedule. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 5316)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5316 of title 5, United States Code, relating to level V of the Executive Schedule, to apply to the position of General Counsel of the General Services Administration.
